name: Dont Let The Boss Catch You Flirting (a get a date game)
name_original: Dont Let The Boss Catch You Flirting (a get a date game)
description:
Try flirting in your office but dont be dumb and get caught. Beat your bosses, collect the flowers, collect money to buy lots of items and be smart at flirting.
A great way to kill time and get hours of fun.
